text: John J. "Jack" Kraft (c. 1921 - August 28, 2014) was an American basketball coach. He coached Villanova for 12 years, from 1961 through 1973.ESPN College Basketball Encyclopedia. 277. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Kraft died on August 28, 2014 at the age of 93 in New Jersey. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Jack Kraft
